name: Yunus Emre Institute
goal: Yunus Emre Institute represents Turkish culture, language and arts on a Global scale. Its aim is to establish new channels, enhance cooperation and foster cultural transaction of cultural activities between Turkey and the rest of the World.  Yunus Emre considers arts, sports, literature, music, science, business & economy and beyond as the main components of cultural diplomacy and indeed these are among the most important pillars of sustainable and harmonious relations among different societies.
interests: Culture, Culture and media, Digital economy and society, Education and training, Youth
euInitiatives: Our organization follows various EU initiatives in culture and education. Creative Europe, is among the programs we are most interested in.
